data.meta_description: From baby and toddler groups to swimming, sensory sessions and so much more, browse our guide to the best activities for babies and toddlers in Great Wyrley.
data.text:
Baby Development Course - Tots Play, Cannock

Tots Play’s 6 week Baby Development course is designed especially for our youngest babies, and provides you with a range of skills and activity ideas to give your baby a head start in life. The course includes an introduction to baby massage, baby yoga, signing, sensory play, songs and rhymes, tummy time techniques and lots of fun!!! To ensure you get the most out of the course you will receive a full colour workbook, giving details of all the techniques and activity ideas covered at each session.You will also receive a CD containing a selection of the songs used during the course and a bottle of massage oil so that you can practice both massage and yoga at home with your little one, and get other family members involved. What people have said after completing the course: “Excellent course. Lynn was brilliant.” “She loved watching the other babies, enjoys the yoga and massage, loved the sensory stuff. Lynn is so perfect for this business- full of energy and enthusiasm.” “Lovely small group- felt very comfortable. I enjoyed the baby massage and yoga. The colic routine has helped my son. Tummy time ideas very useful. He will be a happy and calm child due to massage and yoga. He will learn from continuing the ideas at home (sensory play). It was good to cover lots of various topics in one group. The group leader, Lynn, was really friendly and welcoming. Manual was really useful especially the photographs.” “We have lots of ideas for activities during the day, she is stronger and the calming activities were great.“ “Ruby has learned to enjoy massage and can be calmed more easily with songs and movement when she is fractious. Really appreciated the effort Lynn made to tailor the course contents to her needs and abilities” (premature baby) “We both really enjoyed the course, it gave us some really good ideas. Enjoyed ‘tummy time’ at last. “Really enjoyed baby massage, tummy time, bubbles and joining in with the songs. She is developing well and relaxes with the things I’ve learnt. Lovely classes, Lynn is very helpful and goes out of her way.” “We really enjoyed the course and look forward to learning more in Discovery Tots. Lynn is a fantastic teacher!”

Tots Play Social Tots, Rugeley

Social Tots - Enjoy FUN sessions while boosting your child's development. Social Tots encourages creative thinking alongside social and physical development. Every week we will focus on a different sense that your baby uses to explore the world so we bring them fun objects to explore in their own way from ribbons to rice, bubbles to beach balls and lots lots more. We incorporate Yoga and movement to music which concentrates on different areas of the body each week developing your child's body awareness, gross motor skills and body and mind stimulation. Social Tots is a fabulous introduction to baby signing with songs and rhymes helps with your child's communication skills. Most importantly you get to spend special time with your child while having lots of fun and meeting mums with similar aged children........ Come and try Tots Play for a free taster session and find out what we have to offer for you and your little one.

Discovery Tots - Tots Play, Rugeley

Discovery Tots - Enjoy FUN sessions while boosting your child's development. Every week we will focus on a different sense that your baby uses to explore the world so we bring them fun objects to explore in their own way from ribbons to rice, bubbles to beach balls and lots lots more. We incorporate Baby Yoga and movement to music which concentrates on different areas of the body each week developing there body awareness, gross motor skills and body and mind stimulation. Discovery Tots is a fabulous introduction to baby signing with songs and rhymes helps with your child's communication skills. Most importantly you get to spend special time with your child while having lots of fun and meeting mums with similar aged children........ Come and try a session for free to see what Tots Play has to offer for you and your little one .

Tots Play Baby Development Course, Rugeley

NOW TAKING BOOKINGS FOR THE NEXT BABY DEVELOPMENT COURSE IN RUGELEY . Come and join us to experience an introduction to a mixture of activities for you and your precious little one. The course is designed to provide you with skills to give your baby a head start in life. The course is a great way to meet other mommies with babies of similar ages. Activities include baby massage, baby yoga, songs and rhymes, signing and sensory play. Take some time out with your baby to enjoy bonding and playing with them. Tots Play will give you techniques that you can continue to do at home and you will find these in the full colour course book that we provide. You will also receive massage oil and a selection of songs that are used during the course, ideal to get the rest of the family involved. Over the 6 weeks you will learn: * Full Body Massage for your little one * Colic Relief Routine * Massage techniques to help with wind and constipation * Calming holds and techniques * Ways to make tummy time more enjoyable for you and your baby. * A range of signs to help you and your baby communicate with each other from an early age * An introduction to simple sensory play that you can re-create at home. Click on this link http://www.totsplay.co.uk/#!stafford-and-rugeley/c15ox and GET IN TOUCH FOR MORE INFORMATION and reserve a space on this course.

Social Tots - Enjoy FUN sessions while boosting your child's development. Social Tots encourages creative thinking alongside social and physical development. Every week we will focus on a different sense that your baby uses to explore the world so we bring them fun objects to explore in their own way from ribbons to rice, bubbles to beach balls and lots lots more. We incorporate Yoga and movement to music which concentrates on different areas of the body each week developing your child's body awareness, gross motor skills and body and mind stimulation. Social Tots is a fabulous introduction to baby signing with songs and rhymes helps with your child's communication skills. Most importantly you get to spend special time with your child while having lots of fun and meeting mums with similar aged children........ Come and have some fun with your little one at Tots Play, enjoy a free session to see what Social Tots is all about.
